about_the_game: In a world doomed to the tyrant of the great evil Dark Lord, the guild of Ezerath recruits you to eliminate the Dark Lord. You get access to the first 2 of 8 Grand Generals dungeons, obtaining loot and experience along the way. During your grind you can also stop to help the NPC's of Ezerath by completing unique side quests for other fun rewards. The open world also has secrets, extra mini-bosses, events, and enemy loot drops for you to discover. Do you have what it takes to explore and save the land of Ezerath?

short_description: An action packed, beat em' up RPG with an open world for you to explore the demo provides over 10 areas, 2 different dungeons, side quests, over 150 items to collect, multiple classes of combat, and various different mechanics to get stronger. You can play Ezerath's Last Hope with up to 8 friends!
